CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing EchoWave relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: EchoWave is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AetherNet relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: AetherNet is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara relative to AetherNet?
SRP.A: Luminara is {above} AetherNet in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Luminara}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {NovaStream}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is CrimsonLink's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: CrimsonLink's minimum Platform Traffic is in {1995}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AetherNet's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AetherNet's minimum Platform Traffic is in {2003}.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2000, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1996 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1995 and 2000 was {lower} than between 1996 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 2004 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 2004 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2006, did the total Platform Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total platform traffic between 2004 and 2006 was {smaller} than between 1998 and 2002.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2011, did the total Platform Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total platform traffic between 2010 and 2011 was {smaller} than between 2000 and 2010.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Luminara} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Online and Luminara first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Online and Luminara first exchanged leading positions in {1997}.
